tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  HILARIOUS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: One of the Greatest Professors I have ever had! So amazing, and he really challenges you to do your best, and write something you want to write about. I would absolutely recommend him to anyone! And if I could I would take his class again in a heartbeat.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Mr. Syn\'s content will expose you to new things. He has a constant excited energy in the way he teaches. Yes the comments about the music are true, however that is the least important aspect of his class. His motto for writing is "depth not breath".

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Ben is a really awesome teacher that really tries to make the class fun. He\'s outgoing and really helpful and wants you to pass. Though grading is a little weird, he will go over your papers with you to make sure you\'re on the right track.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He has lots of energy and plays music during class sometimes. It didn\'t bother me, and I found his extreme energy level engaging. As long as you show up to class, you\'ll do fine.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Laid back guy, but very thorough teaching style. He\'s really big on correct MLA format and he doesn\'t normally grade on grammar. We did a segment on writing about film, which was cool. Lots of writing and proofreading. As long as you write your papers based on his guidelines and show up for class, you\'ll do fine! Recommended.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I had to drop his class. He played techno the whole time and read word for word from his power point. He had a weird nervousness that put me off and was all over the place.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: helpful but as a teacher couldn\'t stand his class

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I could not stand this class more than a few days. This prof plays techno DURING class. He asked us to do our first in-class writing assignment WHILE he reviewed the syllabus AND played music. Between that and how incredibly bouncy he is my nerves couldn\'t handle it.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Professor Syn is amazingly helpful. He is funny and engaging. He has inspired me to teach College.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Professor Syn always has something interesting to share or teach. His classes always push for creative work or otherwise aim to expand ones own ability in English. I would definitely recommend him.
